title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/stroganov_coulibaly.html
notes:
---------------------------------
Attention: Mikhail Stroganov

We acknowledge the receipt of your message.
Yesterday dated 18-04-06,your partner Barrister
VictorCoulibaly came to our office with your
informations and a changeof ownership of the
consignment belonging to former Mr PeterStroganov was
effected as the consignment belongs to you now asnext
of kin.

However, we conveyed a message to barrister
victorcoulibaly to inform you that your consignment
has incur ademurage fee of US$14.550 apart from the
$20.000 paid upfront byMr Peter Stroganov which
expired long time ago.AlthoughBarrister Victor
Coulibaly asked if the consignment can bereleased to
you on credit unfortunately we made him tounderstand
that we do not release consignments to beneficiarieson
credit as it is contrary to our policy.

You are required to write a letter authorising us
torelease the consignment to your partner at the same
time pay thedemurage fees.
Once we receive the above requirements,the consignment
willbe released to your partner.

Yours Faithfully,

Jean Pierre
(Director of Operations Trust Security)

messages.body:
April 11
vic_coulibaly9@yahoo.com


  Attn:Mikhail Stroganov

  Compliments
  This is to confirm that i acknowledge the receipt
of your message.
  First and foremost how are you today?i hope that
you are hale and hearty like i do.
  However,i am so very glad that you respond to my
mail.
  A review of my previous mail,you will see that the
original owner of the consignment who was my client
died together with his family in september 11 attack
in the united states.since then effort to locate
next of kin proved abortive as the entire family
died in the incident.

  Since i am his attorney,i would like you to apply
as the next of kin of the consignment to the
security company where the consignment is
deposited.this is because i told the director of the
company(Dr Jean Pierre) that i will bring the next
of kin to claim the consignment .so what you have to
do now is to write a letter to the security company
indicating that you are the next of kin at the same
time instruct the company to release the consignment
to me as your legal representative here.when this is
done,i shall then deposit it into a prime bank here
for onward transfer of your share into any account
you nominate.

  Already this morning i had written a letter to the
security company confirming you as the next of kin
that will claim the consignment.
  this is the information of the security company
  NAME.......TRUST SECURITY LOME TOGO
  EMAIL        trustsecurity@gawab.com
  DIRECTOR....DR JEAN PIERRE
  TEL                +228)944 8045


  My good friend,it will be a thing of joy if you
can make out time to visit me here so that we can
conclude this transation facially right in the
security company.
Morealso,it will be a very good opportunity for both
of us to know ourselves too well.

  Endeavour as much as possible to contact the
security company.
  secondly ,send me your full contact information to
enable me effect a change of beneficiary from the
name of the decease to your name so that you can
have full access to the consignment.

  Be informed that the security company does not
know the real content in the box to debar them from
raising eyebrow if they know that it is money.my
client gave me this information before his death.

  Thank you so very much for your willingness to
assist towards this noble transaction.feel very free
to tell me your percentage from the total sum of
eight million dollars and be courageous because the
fund is legitimately acquired free from drugs,arms
deal,terrorism nor terrorist related
activities.Please do include your telephone and fax
number.

  Looking forward to hearing from you soonest.
  Wishing you GODS richest blessing

  Yours very sincerely

  Barrister Victor Coulibaly

Attn:Mikhail Stroganov

Compliments
This is to confirm that i acknowledge the receipt of your message.
First and foremost how are you today?i hope that you are hale and hearty like i do.
However,i am so very glad that you respond to my mail.
A review of my previous mail,you will see that the original owner of the consignment who was my client died together with his family in september 11 attack in the united states.since then effort to locate next of kin proved abortive as the entire family died in the incident.

Since i am his attorney,i would like you to apply as the next of kin of the consignment to the security company where the consignment is deposited.this is because i told the director of the company(Dr Jean Pierre) that i will bring the next of kin to claim the consignment .so what you have to do now is to write a letter to the security company indicating that you are the next of kin at the same time instruct the company to release the consignment to me as your legal representative here.when this is done,i shall then deposit it into a prime bank here for onward transfer of your share into any account you nominate.

Already this morning i had written a letter to the security company confirming you as the next of kin that will claim the consignment.
this is the information of the security company
NAME.......TRUST SECURITY LOME TOGO
EMAIL trustsecurity@gawab.com
DIRECTOR....DR JEAN PIERRE
TEL +228)944 8045

My good friend,it will be a thing of joy if you can make out time to visit me here so that we can conclude this transation facially right in the security company.
Morealso,it will be a very good opportunity for both of us to know ourselves too well.

Endeavour as much as possible to contact the security company.
secondly ,send me your full contact information to enable me effect a change of beneficiary from the name of the decease to your name so that you can have full access to the consignment.

Be informed that the security company does not know the real content in the box to debar them from raising eyebrow if they know that it is money.my client gave me this information before his death.

Thank you so very much for your willingness to assist towards this noble transaction.feel very free to tell me your percentage from the total sum of eight million dollars and be courageous because the fund is legitimately acquired free from drugs,arms deal,terrorism nor terrorist related activities.Please do include your telephone and fax number.

Looking forward to hearing from you soonest.
Wishing you GODS richest blessing

Yours very sincerely

Barrister Victor Coulibaly

messages.body:
BARRISTER COOLIBALLY

THANK YOU FOR YOUR E-MAIL_I AM VERY WELL THANK
YOU_HOWEVER MY OLD FRIEND ROMAN ABRAMOVICH IS VERY
WORRIED THAT HIS CHELSEA TEAM MIGHT NOT WIN THE
ENGLISH PREMIER LEAGUE_I HAVE HAD HIM ON THE TELEPHONE
THREE TIMES TODAY ALREADY_DO YOU LIKE FOOTBALL???_TO
BUSINESS_YOUR E-MAIL IS CERTAINLY OF INTEREST_PLEASE
CAN YOU SEND ME SOME DOCUMENTARY EVIDENCE OF THIS
CLAIM AND WE CAN MOVE FROM THERE

 -  MIKHAIL ILICHY ROMAN STROGANOV

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail Stroganov  Compliments
  This is to confirm that i acknowledge the receipt
of your message.
  however,your friend (chelsea coach) should be
courageous as chelsea is the best club in english
premiership today.

  Infact i am a fan of chelsea as we have world
class players like
Lampard,Drogba,Terry,Makelele,William
gallas,etc.they are my idols and i am glad that you
love chelsea as a team.

  On the other hand,as regards our transaction,i am
very far from my chamber now.i shall send you the
certificate of deposit tomorrow.

  Once again thank you very much for your
willingness to assist towards this noble
transaction.

  Take care and have a nice day.

  Yours very sincerely

  Br.Victor Coulibaly
messages.raw:
Victor Coulibaly

Dear Mikhail Stroganov Compliments
This is to confirm that i acknowledge the receipt of your message.
however,your friend (chelsea coach) should be courageous as chelsea is the best club in english premiership today.

Infact i am a fan of chelsea as we have world class players like Lampard,Drogba,Terry,Makelele,William gallas,etc.they are my idols and i am glad that you love chelsea as a team.

On the other hand,as regards our transaction,i am very far from my chamber now.i shall send you the certificate of deposit tomorrow.

Once again thank you very much for your willingness to assist towards this noble transaction.

Take care and have a nice day.

Yours very sincerely

Br.Victor Coulibaly

messages.body:
Dear Mr Mikhail Stroganov
  Compliments
  Thank you very much for your mail most especially
chelsea,s victory over west ham on sunday.Although i
know that chelsea must make it.

  Yes, i am of the opinion that the coach should use
the new 442 with drogba and crespo upfront.drogba is
a very great player that never misses
opportunity.that is why he should always go
upfront.joy and victory is always on our side
because we rule all over the world.chelsea is a
blessed club.tell abrahamovic that lots of chelsea
fans exist here in africa than ever thought.even
there is a complex here written CHELSEA FAN CLUB
with lots of admirers.one day,abrahamovic shall
visit africa for the official inauguration.TELL HIM
THIS.

  On the other hand,i have just sent by attachment
the certificate of deposit under my possession
before the death of my client in the september 11
attack in united states.
  right now you have to contact the security company
for a change of ownership of the consignment from
late Mr Peter P Stroganov to your favour as the
current beneficiary.This will give you full
authority to instruct the company to release the
consignment to me on your behalf so that i can
deposit it into a prime bank for onward transfer
into your account.

  Please forward your full contact information for a
change of ownership in the security company.
  Once again thank you very much for your kind
attention.
  Looking forward to hearing from you.
  Yours very sincerely
  Br.Victor Coulibaly
messages.raw:
Victor Coulibaly

Dear Mr Mikhail Stroganov
Compliments
Thank you very much for your mail most especially chelsea,s victory over west ham on sunday.Although i know that chelsea must make it.

Yes, i am of the opinion that the coach should use the new 442 with drogba and crespo upfront.drogba is a very great player that never misses opportunity.that is why he should always go upfront.joy and victory is always on our side because we rule all over the world.chelsea is a blessed club.tell abrahamovic that lots of chelsea fans exist here in africa than ever thought.even there is a complex here written CHELSEA FAN CLUB with lots of admirers.one day,abrahamovic shall visit africa for the official inauguration.TELL HIM THIS.

On the other hand,i have just sent by attachment the certificate of deposit under my possession before the death of my client in the september 11 attack in united states.
right now you have to contact the security company for a change of ownership of the consignment from late Mr Peter P Stroganov to your favour as the current beneficiary.This will give you full authority to instruct the company to release the consignment to me on your behalf so that i can deposit it into a prime bank for onward transfer into your account.

Please forward your full contact information for a change of ownership in the security company.
Once again thank you very much for your kind attention.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
Yours very sincerely
Br.Victor Coulibaly

messages.body:
My dear mikhail   Compliments and happy easter in
advance.
  This is to confirm that i acknowledge the receipt
of your message.abrahomic should exercise patience
and be courageous despite Ferguson,s( manchester
united coach) boost to win all his matches.He is
only a coach not a player.
  I am going to be on the screen this evening to
wish bad luck to manchester united as they shall be
playing sunderland.Ferguson should know that there
is no perfect predictor in football.

  We pray that our club (chelsea) fly in good
colours at last.

  Well on business,the security company is too
occupied to effect a change of ownership to your
favour.they told me to come tomorrow morning and if
we cannot do it tomorrow,it then means that on
monday,everything will be done.as soon as we finish
it,i shall send you a copy.

  Once again thank you very much for your concern.
  GOD is always with us and chelsea.
  Happy easter and prosperous days in advance.
  Sincerely
  Br.victor coulibaly
messages.raw:
Victor Coulibaly

My dear mikhail Compliments and happy easter in advance.
This is to confirm that i acknowledge the receipt of your message.abrahomic should exercise patience and be courageous despite Ferguson,s( manchester united coach) boost to win all his matches.He is only a coach not a player.
I am going to be on the screen this evening to wish bad luck to manchester united as they shall be playing sunderland.Ferguson should know that there is no perfect predictor in football.

We pray that our club (chelsea) fly in good colours at last.

Well on business,the security company is too occupied to effect a change of ownership to your favour.they told me to come tomorrow morning and if we cannot do it tomorrow,it then means that on monday,everything will be done.as soon as we finish it,i shall send you a copy.

Once again thank you very much for your concern.
GOD is always with us and chelsea.
Happy easter and prosperous days in advance.
Sincerely
Br.victor coulibaly

messages.body:
My dear Mikhail Stroganov
  Compliments
  Happy easter and welcome from your trip.
  However,i received your message and sincerely
speaking the truth is that i am surprise to hearing
that i sent you dozens of emails with pictures.
  Please kindly check your system because i am not
the one sending such mails with photos.
  Well,the good news is that a change of ownership
has been effected in your favour today in the
security company.you are now the bonafide owner of
the consignment.
  You are entitle to write a letter to the security
company and instruct that the consignment should be
released to me as your legal representative here.
  Meanwhile,the security company told me that as at
the time of the deposit,an upfront payment of twenty
thousand dollars was made by late MR PETER STROGANOV
covering any future demurrage charges.
  The director of the company told me that the money
has expired and the consigment has accumuated a
fresh demurrage charge of equivalent of fourteen
thousand five hundred and fifty dollars.
  You have to assist me clear this charges before
the security company can release the consignment to
you.This is because the Director (Mr Jean Pierre)
told me that without clearing the demurrage
charges,he cannot release the consignment to you. I
tried my possible best to persuade him release it to
you anytime you asked for it so that their fee can
be paid in advance but he refused saying that it is
against their rule and ethics.Presently i have with
me five thousand dollars and we need about nine
thousand five hundred and fifty dollars to complete
the balance.
  So you have to contact the security company as
regards release of the consignment to you.
  Below is their information.
  COMPANY NAMEÉÉTRUST SECURITY LOME TOGO
  Email trustsecurity@gawab.com
  TEL +(228) 944 8045
  DIRECTOR JEAN PIERRE
  You can reach me on my direct telephone number
(+228) 914 53 01
  Call me upon the receipt of this mail so that we
can discuss in details as regards to retrieving the
consignment and depositing the fund into a prime
bank here for onward transfer into any account you
nominate.once the fund is transferred,i shall come
over immediately to your country of residence or
where you want me to be.
  I sent by attachment (CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP
CERTIFICATE) where you are the bonafide owner of the
consignment.

  Be informed that the security company does not
know the real content in the consignment so that
they will not raise eyebrow if they find out that it
is money thereby jeopardise the transaction.
  Looking forward to hearing from you.
  Wishing  you and our club (CHELSEA) GODS richest
blessing.

  Yours very sincerely
  Br.Victor Coulibaly
messages.raw:
Victor Coulibaly

My dear Mikhail Stroganov
Compliments
Happy easter and welcome from your trip.
However,i received your message and sincerely speaking the truth is that i am surprise to hearing that i sent you dozens of emails with pictures.
Please kindly check your system because i am not the one sending such mails with photos.
Well,the good news is that a change of ownership has been effected in your favour today in the security company.you are now the bonafide owner of the consignment.
You are entitle to write a letter to the security company and instruct that the consignment should be released to me as your legal representative here.
Meanwhile,the security company told me that as at the time of the deposit,an upfront payment of twenty thousand dollars was made by late MR PETER STROGANOV covering any future demurrage charges.
The director of the company told me that the money has expired and the consigment has accumuated a fresh demurrage charge of equivalent of fourteen thousand five hundred and fifty dollars.
You have to assist me clear this charges before the security company can release the consignment to you.This is because the Director (Mr Jean Pierre) told me that without clearing the demurrage charges,he cannot release the consignment to you. I tried my possible best to persuade him release it to you anytime you asked for it so that their fee can be paid in advance but he refused saying that it is against their rule and ethics.Presently i have with me five thousand dollars and we need about nine thousand five hundred and fifty dollars to complete the balance.
So you have to contact the security company as regards release of the consignment to you.
Below is their information.
COMPANY NAMEÉÉTRUST SECURITY LOME TOGO
Email trustsecurity@gawab.com
TEL +(228) 944 8045
DIRECTOR JEAN PIERRE
You can reach me on my direct telephone number (+228) 914 53 01
Call me upon the receipt of this mail so that we can discuss in details as regards to retrieving the consignment and depositing the fund into a prime bank here for onward transfer into any account you nominate.once the fund is transferred,i shall come over immediately to your country of residence or where you want me to be.
I sent by attachment (CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE) where you are the bonafide owner of the consignment.

Be informed that the security company does not know the real content in the consignment so that they will not raise eyebrow if they find out that it is money thereby jeopardise the transaction.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
Wishing you and our club (CHELSEA) GODS richest blessing.

Yours very sincerely
Br.Victor Coulibaly

information.Hope that you have forgiven me.

we can pay after but they refused.

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail Stroganov  I received your message.
  Please do not tell the security company that the
real content in the consignment is money.i am afraid
that if they discover that it is money,they may
decide to fold their company and run away with the
money or may use assassins to kill me and claim the
money.

  Secondly,we cannot tell the security company to
open the box and take their demurage charges.we
should not ask them to do so inorder not to
jeopardise this noble transaction.

  There is a very big difference between you people
in the western world and we africans.it will be as
easy as abc to tell a security company in the
western world to open a consignment and take his
charges,he will do so without problem.this is quite
different here talking about millions of
dollars.They will only kill you without trace.

  Mr Mikhail,i know that you may be thinking that
how can you pay such amount of money without knowing
me neither have we met before.Relationship begins in
a second.Lots of international business today
depends on trust despite the distance.Some people
met their wives through the internet and they live a
very happy home today.

  So my friend,try as much as possible to help by
paying this fee to the security company so that they
can release the consignment to me according to your
instruction.i am in constant communication with the
company and they insist that the charges must be
paid before they can release the consignment to you.
  This morning i went and made advance payment of
five thousand dollars and they issued a receipt to
me.please try to send nine thousand five hundred and
fifty dollars to them to complete the total sum of
fourteen thousand five hundred and fifty dollars
required.Once they release the consignment,there are
lots of international banks here where i can deposit
the money for onward transfer into any account you
nominate.
  Try to send me your telephone number and please
try to call me.

  I promise to discharge my duties effeciently,show
good examples worthy of emulation.I sent my photo to
you by attachment.Please do send yours also.
  However, chelsea should not look for any player to
buy because the ones with them are still
wonderful.We pray for their success.

  Your cooperation is highly solicited.

  Looking forward to hearing from you
  sincerely

  Br Victor Coulibaly
messages.raw:
Victor Coulibaly

Dear Mikhail Stroganov I received your message. Please do not tell the security company that the real content in the consignment is money.i am afraid that if they discover that it is money,they may decide to fold their company and run away with the money or may use assassins to kill me and claim the money.

Secondly,we cannot tell the security company to open the box and take their demurage charges.we should not ask them to do so inorder not to jeopardise this noble transaction.

There is a very big difference between you people in the western world and we africans.it will be as easy as abc to tell a security company in the western world to open a consignment and take his charges,he will do so without problem.this is quite different here talking about millions of dollars.They will only kill you without trace.

Mr Mikhail,i know that you may be thinking that how can you pay such amount of money without knowing me neither have we met before.Relationship begins in a second.Lots of international business today depends on trust despite the distance.Some people met their wives through the internet and they live a very happy home today.

So my friend,try as much as possible to help by paying this fee to the security company so that they can release the consignment to me according to your instruction.i am in constant communication with the company and they insist that the charges must be paid before they can release the consignment to you. This morning i went and made advance payment of five thousand dollars and they issued a receipt to me.please try to send nine thousand five hundred and fifty dollars to them to complete the total sum of fourteen thousand five hundred and fifty dollars required.Once they release the consignment,there are lots of international banks here where i can deposit the money for onward transfer into any account you nominate.
Try to send me your telephone number and please try to call me.

I promise to discharge my duties effeciently,show good examples worthy of emulation.I sent my photo to you by attachment.Please do send yours also. However, chelsea should not look for any player to buy because the ones with them are still wonderful.We pray for their success.

Your cooperation is highly solicited.

Looking forward to hearing from you
sincerely
Br Victor Coulibaly

messages.body:
Dear Mr   Mikhail Stroganov   
  I  received your message.
  Mr Jean Pierre told me that he cannot release the
consignment without the fee completed.Please do 
anything to assist me here.

  However, i sold the only car with me and realised
about two thousand five hundred dollars.

  You are the only last hope i have now please.
  Kindly extend my sincere and warmest greetings to
our friend Abrahamovic.
  Tell him that i am a very strong chelsea fan here
in africa and promised to meet him one day so that
the chelsea fan club africa will be inaugurated
officially here and he will be our special guest
including you.

  Whenever we retrieve the consignment from the
company,i shall invest about one hundred three
hundred thousand dollars to modify our CHELSEA FAN
CLUB OFFICE HERE.

  Please my good friend,do not turn your back on
me.Remember how we started and nobody knows about
this transaction except both of us.I have sold the
only thing i have.

  What i said about revealing the content in the
consignment to the security company is not to our
advantage if they know that it is such huge amount
of money for security reason.
  Please help my dear.

  Save journey.

  Yours sincerely

  Br.Victor Coulibaly

What i said about revealing the content in the consignment to the security company is not to our advantage if they know that it is such huge amount of money for security reason.
Please help my dear.

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail Stroganov
  This morning i went to the security company and
was told that you wrote asking for a hotel
accomodation and they refered you to me.sincerely
speaking the truth is that i am surprise on hearing
this.since i am your lawyer here,if you are sincere
to yourself why should the security company arrange
a hotel for you.

  Secondly,from all indication i am beggining to
suspect that you take this transaction as
childsplay.You cannot call me nor give me your
number knowing the amount of money involving.

  The truth is that i asked MR JEAN PIERRE to
nullify you as the beneficiary.he told me that since
a change of consignment is in your favour,its either
you issue a power of attorney to me nullify your
beneficiary or i go to court and swear affidavits
nullifying your status as the beneficiary since i am
the only that forwarded your information.

  I cannot wait to receive power of attorney from
you rather will go to court tomorrow to swear
affidavits disassociating you from the transaction
and source for a capable hand to conclude this noble
transaction with me.

  Bye

  Barrister Victor Coulibaly

HOW CAN ANYONE TELL YOU WHEN THEIR FUNERAL IS WHEN
THEY ARE DEAD ALREADY_RATHER LIKE YOUR  FEW BRAIN
CELLS FROM THE LOCAL ROTGUT_TELL ME THOUGH_WHY DOES A
CHRONICALLY DENSE MUGU LIKE YOU TRY 419
SCAMMING??_YOU'RE FAR TOO STUPID TO DO IT_WHY NOT TRY
SOMETHING MORE ATTUNED TO YOUR TALENTS LIKE SERVICING
ALL THE MALE CUSTOMERS AT THE FESTAC TOWN PUBLIC
TOILETS???_JUST A THOUGHT THOUGH I'D BE DELIGHTED IF
YOU ENDED UP IN JAIL AS A 30 STONE BIKER'S BITCH_IT'S
ALL YOU'RE GOOD FOR_NOW F*** OFF YOU VILE TURD
messages.raw:
Mikhail Stroganov

YOU MUPPET-HEADED MUGU MORON
